data.message: You want to know how I'd like to interact with Facebook? By having "Most Recent" be my default option on my newsfeed. YES YES, I know I can SET IT to "Most Recent" as opposed to "Top Stories" - this is not what I want to have to do EVERY FEW DAYS. Please make this something I can set on Facebook to be defaulted to.

replies.message: We appreciate your feedback, Maryann. We're working hard to ensure that our updates improve Facebook for everyone. Let us know what would make Facebook more enjoyable here: http://bit.ly/2uLpEjD. -Pri
